title: Staff of Spell Power
content:

A near-perfect relic that is only blemished by the collected palm- sweat of various archrnagifrom across the Realms.

BG3 Staff of Spell Power Information

Arcane Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and spell attack rolls. Arcane Battery: Alleviate the arcane burden of spelleasting with the power of this staff. The next spell you cast doesn't cost a spell slot. Range: 1.5m
